game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is unraveling. Players take on the role of a Chronos Guardian, tasked with repairing the timestream and restoring balance to the universe. Along the way, they must navigate treacherous landscapes, avoid rival time travelers, and make difficult choices that impact the fate of entire civilizations.
game.beginning: The game begins in the realm of Aethoria, where the player's character is awakened by a mysterious entity known as The Architect. With no memory of their past, they are tasked with exploring the realm and uncovering the secrets of the broken timestream.
game.ending: Ultimately, the player's choices will determine one of multiple possible endings: restoring balance to the universe, succumbing to the power of the timestream, or unraveling reality entirely. The fate of eternity is in their hands.
